comment: Not as rich as I was expecting, no wine finish, defiantly shows the distillery character off with age.

On the nose pear vanilla melon peach.

On the palate it's supposed to be unpeated but I can feel like it was.
Citrus, ginger

Long and powerful finish a bit burning.
But maybe because I'm on fire !
dobrá. není kouř, nasládlá, jemná. pil jsem po večeři, vínu a sladkostech 😬
light, creamy, sweet, a touch of salt/iodine. i love this stuff.
